short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds the IMDb const from any imdb.com url and copies it to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMDb "const" ids are commonly used when creating lists and datasets by content creators. Typically these consts are retrieved by finding the IMDb name or title page and copying the const from the url. This extension allows users to right-click an IMDb link and copy the const from the link to their clipboard.

A const example is:
https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000138/ <-- Leonardo DiCaprio
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1375666/ <-- Inception

This extension will copy the value "nm0000138" to the clipboard for if right-clicking on the link "Leonardo DiCaprio" and selecting the "Copy IMDb Const" contextMenu option.
